llc.processing_time: Standard: 5-7 business days, Expedited: 4-hour or 24-hour service available for additional fees
llc.annual_filing: Statement of Information (LLC-12) - Due within 90 days of registration, then every 2 years

corporation.processing_time: Standard: 5-7 business days, Expedited: 4-hour or 24-hour service available for additional fees
corporation.annual_filing: Statement of Information (SI-550) - Due within 90 days of registration, then annually

partnership.processing_time: Standard: 5-7 business days, Expedited: 4-hour or 24-hour service available for additional fees

registered_agent.description: All entities must designate a registered agent for service of process with a physical California address.

business_license.description: City/county business license required based on business location.

seller_permit.authority: California Department of Tax and Fee Administration

ein.description: Federal Employer Identification Number required for all entities except sole proprietorships with no employees.

edd.description: Registration with Employment Development Department required if hiring employees.

entity_name.description: The official name of your business entity.
entity_name.tips: Must include required designation (LLC, Inc., etc.). Check availability on CA SOS website before filing.

business_purpose.description: Statement of what the business will do.
business_purpose.tips: Can be general (e.g., 'any lawful activity for which an LLC may be organized').

registered_agent.description: Person or entity designated to receive legal documents.
registered_agent.tips: Must have a physical CA address (no P.O. boxes). Can be a business entity owner with a CA address or a registered agent service.

principal_address.description: Main office location of the business.
principal_address.tips: Must be a physical address, not a P.O. box.

management_structure.description: For LLCs, indicates whether member-managed or manager-managed.
management_structure.tips: Member-managed means all owners participate in management. Manager-managed means designated managers run the business.
